plot: A man abandons his daughter because of poverty, but seeks her out again 20 years later when he has made his fortune. Now rich, his daughter becomes the target of kidnappers.
title: Nodaji
plot_es: A man abandons his daughter because of poverty, but seeks her out again 20 years later when he has made his fortune. Now rich, his daughter becomes the target of kidnappers.
plot_en: A man abandons his daughter because of poverty, but seeks her out again 20 years later when he has made his fortune. Now rich, his daughter becomes the target of kidnappers.
